item.title: Country selector with flag images in ExtJS
item.description: Based on the ExtJS-Tutorial on how to build a combo box with an icon, I built a component that can be used as a country selector in ExtJS. Here you can find the code of the component: Ext.ns('Extreme.components'); Extreme.components.CountryCombo = Ext.extend(Ext.form.ComboBox, { constructor: function(config){ var data; if (config.phoneLabels) { data = [['+49', '+49', 'ux-flag-de'], ['+43', '+43', 'ux-flag-at'], ['+41', '+41', 'ux-flag-ch'], ['+352', '+352', 'ux-flag-lu'], ['+432', '+432', 'ux-flag-li']]; } else { data = [['DE', 'Deutschland', 'ux-flag-de'], ['AT', 'Ã–sterreich', 'ux-flag-at'], ['CH', 'Schweiz', 'ux-flag-ch'], ['LU', 'Luxemburg', 'ux-flag-lu'], ['LI', 'Lichtenstein', 'ux-flag-li']]; } Extreme.
